description:
Go for a backpacking trip, run an ultra, or do a couple triathlons, all on a single charge. Equipped with Garmin’s efficient Power Glass, the fēnix 7 Pro uses the power of the sun to make regular charging a thing of the past. When using the muti-band GPS, Garmin’s SatIQ technology optimizes power usage. SatIQ matches your GPS signal to your environment; flat land gets a low power signal, head into the mountains and the signal is automatically boosted. Free downloadable shaded relief maps help you plan your next trip, and when connected to your phone, can even display live satellite weather. When it comes to navigating your fitness, 24/7 heartrate tracking and other metrics combine to give you a complete picture of how you train, how you recover and how you live. If you need extra information, or motivation, you can download training plans through Garmin’s free Connect app. Connect lets you stream music, receive notifications, track the weather and more. The latest in fēnix line even has a white and red flashlight, making it easier to find your vacation rental’s hidden key.

  • Lightweight titanium bezel is paired with a virtually scratchproof sapphire crystal face
  • Power Glass™ solar panel lets you go longer between charges, from 8 hours to 116 days or longer
  • Sun gauge displays solar charge status
  • Built-in activity modes for biking, running, multisport, swimming, gym activities, team sports, skiing (2000+ ski resort maps) and more
  • Activity animations display the proper form for strength training, yoga, etc
  • Multi-band signal reception and expanded GNSS support (GPS, GLONASS, Galileo, QZSS and IRNSS) provide faster and more accurate positioning and elevation data
  • SatIQ™ matches your current environment with the right GPS mode, optimizing battery life
  • Preloaded with routable North American TopoActive maps, with other regions available for free download
  • Internet Live Tracking during activities (via a phone) allows you to share your location and metrics
  • Round-trip mapping: enter a distance and the fēnix Pro will calculate multiple course options that start and stop right were you are
  • Trendline™ routing uses Garmin’s database of routes to find the most popular way to get you where you are going
  • Up ahead offers at a glance performance metrics and upcoming trail features
  • Hill score displays your running strength and endurance, tracking progress over time
  • Endurance score analyzes training data to map improvements to your overall endurance
  • Morning report summarizes sleep quality, recovery level, training effects, and provides a personalized daily workout
  • Training readiness, training status, and training load modes use your training history to let you know how ready your body is to train, and if you are overtraining, under-training, or on the right path
  • Acute load compares recent workouts against your fitness level and training schedule, keeping you on track to reach your goals
  • Running dynamics info provides running power, cadence, stride length, vertical oscillation, vertical ratio and ground contact time
  • PacePro™, GPS based pace guidance that compares your actual pace vs your goal pace
  • Mountain biking dynamics including jumps: hangtime, distance and speed, grit: overall trail difficulty, and flow: how smoothly you rode the trail
  • Elevate™ V5 optical heart rate monitor has improved reliability during wrist intensive activities like cycling, weightlifting, etc
  • Physiological metrics includes VO2 max, pulse ox, an improved race predictor (5K, 10K, ½ marathon and marathon), recovery advisor, real-time stamina tracking, and performance indicator
  • Heart rate variability (HRV) helps predict recovery and training response
  • Body Battery™ tracks daily energy levels, monitoring what drains you (exercise) and recharges you (rest, food)
  • Incident detection: in the case of an accident the unit will send a signal via your phone to your emergency contacts, letting them know your location and that you need help
  • Stream music via a paired phone using Spotify, Deezer, or Amazon Music. Or, download playlists and podcasts, you can even drag and drop MP3s
  • Garmin Pay™ contact-less payment (if supported by your bank)
  • 24/7 activity tracking learns your activity level and guides you towards a more active lifestyle
  • On board sleep tracking mode monitors total sleep hours as well as periods of movement and restful sleep
name: Garmin Fenix 7 Pro Sapphire Solar
